post.summary: Adds a contact to the CRM and optionally requests a review from them

email.title: The customer's email (used to send email review requests)

firstName.title: The customer's first name (used in review request templates)

lastName.title: The customer's last name (used in review request templates)

mobileNumber.title: The customer's mobile number (used to send SMS review requests)

v1Contact.title: A customer that can be asked to review the business

requestReviewByEmail.title: Request a review via the default email template?

requestReviewBySms.title: Request a review via the default SMS template?

account.title: The AccountGroupId to create the contact under

v1CreateContactRequest.title: Creates a new Contact, and optionally request a review from them via email or SMS

businessId.title: The business the reviews are associated with

reviewId.title: A list of review IDs to retrieve

reviews.title: A list of reviews matching the requested IDs, null if they can't be found

businessId.title: The ID of the business to gather reviews for

from.title: The start of the window in time to gather reviews

to.title: The end of the window in time to gather reviews

cursor.description:
A cursor is provided to allow the client to gather reviews beyond the
first page of results.

v1ListReviewRequest.title: Requests a set of reviews for a business within a specific timeframe

reviews.title: A list of reviews matching the requested time interval

more.description:
Indicates that more reviews were avaialable, but not returned due
to the page size limit.

cursor.description:
A cursor that can be passed to subsequent GetReview requests to
page through the results.

listingId.title: The ID of the listing the review is associated with

businessId.title: The ID of the business the listing is associated with

sourceId.title: The ID of the review source

title.title: The title of the review (not all sites have a title)

hasRating.title: Indicates whether a star rating is included with the review

stars.title: The number of stars (1-5), only valid if has_rating is true

snippet.description:
A snippet of the text of the review (not all sites require a reviewer to
write anything to accompany their star rating).

link.description:
A direct link to the review (or listing, if the source does not support
direct links to individual reviews).

retrieved.description:
The time when review was retrieved.  Some sources have push-APIs so the
reviews will be available almost immediately, others only after they are
periodically fetch.

created.title:
The time when review was created (many sites quarantine reviews, so this
often is not when the review first appeared on the site)

v1Review.description:
Stores the data about a single review, on a single business listing, on a single
review source.
